name: Zeus vs Monsters - Math Game for kids
description: Zeus vs. Monsters is a math game for kids with mixed mathematical operations - addition, subtraction, multiplication & division. With 50 levels and 10 bosses to defeat, this is a real math adventure. Introduce yourself to great fun and Greek mythology â€“ play Zeus vs. Monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 SP1+, 8, 10 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Repetitive and dry Zeus vs Monsters is little more than a successive problem solver amplifying an issue we already see with kids and mathematics, it's dull and boring, small perks are a brief description of the mythological beasts that appear every 5 levels as a boss and the ability to select from either Zeus or Athena as your avatar. It has potential to be useful for people interested in drilling in the basic mathematical functions of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division while under time pressure; but I cannot recommend it as a mathematics game for children as it lacks little to encourage continuation.
